name: Confirmation
content:
![A0-Common_Drops_3.png](https://media-resources.subwallet.app//6/A0_Common_Drops_3_2037ef904e.png)

Version 1.1.50(364)
>- **New assets supported**: BEEFY on AssetHub and HydraDX, xcDED on Moonbeam 
>- **Warning added**: Do not transfer cross-chain to an exchange!

>![Swap is live.png](https://media-resources.subwallet.app/Swap_is_live_2d8184d2c3.png)
>*  New assets supported: BEEFY on AssetHub and HydraDX, xcDED on Moonbeam 
>---
>*  Warning added: Do not transfer cross-chain to an exchange! [Click here!](https://t.me/Playnation_bot/app?startapp=Z4QZc2zjw)

---

#### **Version 1.1.50(364)**
*  New assets supported: BEEFY on AssetHub and HydraDX, xcDED on Moonbeam 
*  Warning added: Do not transfer cross-chain to an exchange! [Click here!](https://web.subwallet.app/welcome)
